name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: FB Auto Reply AI For Marketplace

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: AI-powered chatbot for Facebook Marketplace that sends human-like auto replies based on your product information

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🤖 FB Auto Reply AI - Your 24/7 Marketplace Assistant ⚡

Never miss a sale again! Transform your Facebook Marketplace experience with intelligent auto-replies that feel personal and authentic. Perfect for busy sellers, small businesses, and power users! 

✨ Key Features:
- 💬 Smart AI replies that match your tone and style
- ⚡ Lightning-fast responses (under 1 minute)
- 📊 Track your performance with detailed analytics
- 🔔 Real-time lead notifications
- 🎯 Custom response rules for each listing

🌟 Why Sellers Love Us:
- Save hours every month
- 99% response rate
- Boost sales while working less

🆓 Try it FREE - Start with our basic plan including 100 auto-replies per month!

Perfect for: 
📱 Marketplace sellers
🏪 Small businesses
🛍️ Online retailers
🏷️ Resellers

Join our community of successful sellers who've automated their Marketplace communications. Install now and watch your business grow while spending less time on messages!
